N

next() - Method in class controller.state.edit.PostEdit
function to proceed to the next phase of the game

function to proceed to the next phase of the editing phase of the game
next() - Method in class controller.state.gamephase.endphase.EndPhase
function to proceed to the next phase of the game but as this is the final phase of the game this function does not execute
